Cool game, with a lot of suspense and thrills. 4 People start the game as survivors on a map, fixing generators that opens a  escape door (that also have to be opend.time) . A super powerfull killer is there to stopp you and sacrifice you all on hooks, you can save each other, 1-2 times. 

WARNING: Be prepared to loose a lott of cool sacrifices(things that helps you in game and you earn during game) because of game crashes and people being unwilllingly or deliberately disconected. The help scenter doesent seem to be able to or care bout this happening.

В целом про игру рассказывать долго не буду, все знают её суть геймплей и тд. Для меня проблема одна матчмейкинг ( долго ищутся игры, за убийцу вообще не вышло поиграть, просидел в лобби 15 минут и забил.)

Часто выкидывает. По началу можно было играть за убийцу, через месяц стало так, что создав лобби выживших ждешь 20-30 минут и так они и не подключаются!!!!!!! Меняла регион, ничего не работает и не помогает. Плюс задания с убийцей дают, выполнить их нереально потому что не сыграть за него!!!

I did not expect "Dead by Daylight" to be this great !
The game is so fun & addictive to play.

For an online game, I was impressed with the community 
players are always looking to save eachother and usually work as a team
it's kinda rare for this type of game...

There is also some events to keep the game fresh
and new killers/survivors added regularly.


I will be playing it for a long time for sure !

I can't give enough praises to DBD  ! Go for IT & one of the best fun game on Steam ! 
                                                                                                   (isn't expensive too !)
Play anything else, even fortnite.

Poor balance and very new player unfriendly. Everyone else is going to have all the perks they want and you will be stuck with the crappy ones. To get some of the good combinations of perks you will need to buy multiple DLCs and spend a lot of time unlocking the perks for your other characters. Everyone uses cheap tactics and get mad if you do the same. Not a horrible game but hard to get started in. Probably a lot more fun if you kept up with it early on.
ดบดล เป็นเกมตลก555555

haven't played since early access days, picked it up today, still just as awesome and unique, matchmaking will still have a slightly longer delay than survivors due to the 1v4 ratio, but it's barely noticeable when you start earning serious bloodpoints, just create a lobby THEN mess with your bloodweb, and you don't notice it at all. still an amazing concept, wonderfully executed. 


i haven't reviewed many games on steam, but this one is definitely a MUST OWN and deserves the recognition. Anyone reading this and hesitant? dont be. it's $20 well spent on one of the most unique and addictive thrilling games out there.
굳입니다

A veces divertido, pero con una enorme cantidad de cosas a mejorar, que hacen el juego injugable

En lugar de mejorar y hacer mas claro el sistema de perks y habilidades, los desarrolladores se encargan de empeorar esa confusión al agregar contenido nuevo

EDIT: Mejoró mucho el sistema de seleccion de servidores, ping, y errores al unirse con amigos, de todas formas el juego sigue totalmente desequilibrado.

ACTUALIZACION 18/02/2021: Todo sigue igual
玩了两百个小时，我运气不错，刚入门遇到的屠夫大多都很友善，在三缺一或者明显逃不出去的情况下会放水，很暖心了，特别可爱，很喜欢这个游戏的氛围。作为屠夫就很考验心理素质，熬过四跑的阶段，慢慢就玩出乐趣了。几次更新后上段没有以前那么困难了，很有成就感。嗯...最后，D5死马。
就是人物动作过于僵硬，还有一些bug 比如【寻找房间的时候就卡在那个界面了】    但是总体还是不错的  我很喜欢这款游戏  谢谢

메튜 어머니 요리왕

Great game. A little unbalanced, but still a good game. There is a constant feeling of progression through every game, always something to unlock, some new strategy to try, some new build to implement. It's fun. Winning really just comes down to how much time played. (or if the survivors your playing against are 3-4 stacked, in discord) Some games are super easy, others are impossible. (Odds are heavily stacked against you if survivors are using voice) Some of the fun is finding out what kind of game you are gonna get. Some of the community is Toxic af, but it's an online game, what do you expect.

This game is amazing, 10/10. 4 survivors, 1 killer, all players, what's better than that? Dead by Daylight is very fun to play and the DLCs all have a low price. Definitely worth to buy.

我很热爱这个游戏 但这个游戏的一些机制真的很脑溢血
例如障碍物吸刀的问题 有时出刀明明是砍到了逃生者身上 却会被周围环境里的物体吸过去
有时也会出现逃生者翻窗屠夫却不能左键抓人 无法触发抓人的动画的问题
还有各种在延迟方面的问题 如果逃生者玩家的ping很高 即使钢筋的确钢出来了 也会显示没钢出来
屠夫玩家的ping很高 那么逃生者玩家的ping也会很高
而即便这个游戏各种bug 但现在已然变成了游戏特色 因为这个游戏的制作公司仅仅只是个小公司 没能力修复这些远古时期遗留下来的问题

Good game.. Worth buying.. Only downside is half the killers hide behind paywall

It is a really fun game to play especially with friends. Every minute playing as a survivor is really tense. The only problem I have with this game is that I am having a hard time finding games as a Killer but I could find games instantly as a survivor but I hope this gets better when dedicated servers will roll out. But apart from that, the game is just so much fun and worth the price.
I think they did pretty good job so far

You can buy this game without any suspect. It sometimes may can be frustrating due to toxic players but you encounter with them really rarely. Whereas, I've never seen that much helpful and qualified community in a game.
If you enjoy playing games that make teamwork essential, it will satisfy more than you expect. In addition, as I see, there are many people who hesitate to buy it because they think it as a horror game but indeed it's not. After a short time you'll get used to. Moreover, this game is always on a improvement way and producers deserve all the feedbacks.

Parecía un buen juego al principio, pero con el tiempo se volvió monótono y aburrido, aún lo juego ocasionalmente con mis amigos, por pasar el rato, pero sinceramente esperar más de 1 hora buscando partida como asesino o como superviviente es realmente triste, la cantidad de bugs que tiene es monstruosa, y sinceramente tiene una jugabilidad pésima debería ser un free to play, parece más un indie que un juego AAA a la altura, no te lo recomiendo, no gastes tu dinero en este juego o en sus DLC mejor espera rebajas y compra un juego de verdad.

В начале кажется хорорром, однако после  понимаешь, что это соревновательная игра. Очень понравилась задумка и её реализация + я фанат тёмной атмосферы. Самых сок в разнообразии геймплея. Можно как играть в команде с другими  как в доте или кс, или же выбрать стиль батьки и играть в соло без команды, как например в хс. Именно в этом разнообразии и есть главный плюс игры. Надоесть ещё не успела, хотя на момент обзора у меня только 3 длс и 1 престиж. Очень рад такому открытию игры для задрачивания ранга, ибо дота скатилась.

杀机刚出的时候便关注了 当时是看的视频 可惜电脑配置带不动 过了3年 换了电脑再来体验 杀机这部游戏的确不错 活动方面奖励也越来越好 皮肤也越来越多 但总觉得DLC在迈克尔和杨永信后并不是很给力(并不是说不好 只是没这俩个好) 希望以后的DLC能推出更多新玩法（当然质量第一 起码现在DLC每一个都有自己比较独特的玩法 并不希望数量上去但玩法与其他屠夫相似）也希望出一个双屠夫模式(估计远着呢。。。) 再多出一些地图 祝杀机越做越好

なによりバグがひどい。ちょっとしたものなら笑って済ませられるが無限ロードやスタックなどゲームの進行不可能になるものが多すぎる。さらにマッチング時間が長く、１試合行うのに１５分待つのとかざらです。運営は１試合の時間（１５分くらい）を短くしようとしていますが、それでゲームバランスが崩れてマッチング時間が伸びてるのがこのゲームの現状です。ただどれだけマッチング時間がかかっても、有利側で敵を煽りたい方ならいいのではないでしょうか。あと民度は最低ですね。
